pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Linear Latent Variable Models // Analysis of multivariate data using generalized linear latent variable models (gllvm). Estimation is performed using either Laplace approximation method or variational approximation method implemented via TMB (Kristensen et al., (2016), doi:10.18637/jss.v070.i05). Details for gllvm, see Hui et al. (2015) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12236 and (2017) doi:10.1080/10618600.2016.1164708 and Niku et al. (2017) doi:10.1007/s13253-017-0304-7.
